rukus.text: Nnungu jwenu (jwakuwajilwa kun’galagatila) ni Nnungu jumpepe (Allah). Nambo awala wangaakukulupilila ya Akhera mitima jao jikana (ya Uujika wa Allah) soni wanganyao akuwa ali nkulikwesya
Pangali kaichila yanti Allah akuimanyilila yaakuisisa ni yaakuilosya papaswela. Chisimu Jwalakwe jwangaanonyela wakulikwesya
Soni naga kuli kuwechetedwe kukwao yanti: “Ana M’mbuje gwenu jutulwisye chichi (kwa Muhammadi ﷺ)?” Wanganyao akasatiji: “Adisiadisi sya wandu wakala.” (Akuwechetaga yalakweyi mwakwasokonesya wandu)

Kuti akatwichile misigo jao (jasambi) jakwanila lisiku lya Kiyama, kwisa soni misigo (jasambi) ja awala waakwasokonesya mwangali umanyilisi (wa akusokonesedwao). Naalole, kaje kusakala misigo jachakatwichilejejo
